name: mapd-data-layer
description: SQL data-layer for the MapD frontend

scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/mapd-data-layer.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/mapd-data-layer.min.js
scripts.build: yarn run build:commonjs && yarn run build:es && yarn run build:umd && yarn run build:umd:min
scripts.docs: documentation build --config documentation.yml src/index.js src/types -f md -o docs/API.md
scripts.prepare: yarn run clean && yarn test && yarn run build
scripts.pretty: find . -name "*.js" | grep -v -f .gitignore | grep -v src/index.js | xargs prettier --write
scripts.test: flow && BABEL_ENV=test nyc tape -r babel-register tests/**/**.spec.js tests/**.spec.js
